verifications.name: session-start
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, executes session-start-chain.sh handlers for repository integrity checks and state injection

verifications.name: session-end
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, handles session cleanup and final telemetry emission on session termination

verifications.name: user-prompt-submit
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, analyzes user prompts and injects context via prompt.sh handler chain

verifications.name: pre-tool-edit
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, guards Edit/Write operations via playbook-guard.sh and protected-edit.sh

verifications.name: pre-tool-bash
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, guards Bash commands via bash-check.sh for destructive operation prevention

verifications.name: post-tool-edit
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, handles post-edit operations including archive-playbook.sh for auto-archiving

verifications.name: subagent-stop
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, handles SubAgent completion with archive-playbook.sh fallback for non-Edit completions

verifications.name: pre-compact
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, handles context compaction with pre-compact checkpoint creation

verifications.name: stop-event
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, guards stop events to prevent premature session termination without post-loop

verifications.name: notification
verifications.evidence: Valid bash script with shebang #!/bin/bash, sources telemetry.sh, routes notification events to telemetry system for logging and monitoring
